lead_paragraph: One man faces up to 18 years in prison and the other could get up to 10 years for the 2013 killing of a boy Michael R. Bloomberg called “a victim of too many guns on our streets.”

headline.print_headline: 2 Men Plead Guilty to Fatal Shooting of Bronx Teenager
headline.main: 2 Gang Members Plead Guilty to Fatal Shooting of Bronx Teenager

snippet: One man faces up to 18 years in prison and the other could get up to 10 years for the 2013 killing of a boy Michael R. Bloomberg called “a victim of too many guns on our streets.”
abstract: Raul Pacheco and Eric Landron, reputed to be members of Latin Kings gang in Bronx, plead guilty to manslaughter charges in 2013 gun death of 17-year-old Alphonza Bryant III.
